attributes.action: give John Simpson, BBC reporter, a knighthood.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For his courage and bravery in reporting world events. Isn't it about time this chap got greater recognition?

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
